verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:39
verses.text: And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:40
verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal: and Merib–baal begat Micah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:41
verses.text: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:42
verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jarah; and Jarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:43
verses.text: And Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:44
verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.
